Class MedicationStock

java.lang.Object
com.group6.hms.app.managers.inventory.models.MedicationStock
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MedicationStock extends Object implements Serializable
The MedicationStock class represents the stock details of a medication, including the current stock level and the minimum stock level before restocking is needed. It implements Serializable to support storage and retrieval.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • MedicationStock

      public MedicationStock(Medication medication, int currentStock, int lowStockLevelLimit)
      Constructs a new MedicationStock with the specified medication, current stock level, and low stock level limit.
      Parameters:
      medication - the Medication associated with this stock
      currentStock - the current stock level of the medication
      lowStockLevelLimit - the stock level at which a restock is recommended
